abstract: Go beyond a short-term view of Bank of America’s prime assets, and Jamie Dimon, the JPMorgan Chase chief and unofficial winner of the credit crisis, may need to watch his back.
snippet: Go beyond a short-term view of Bank of America’s prime assets, and Jamie Dimon, the JPMorgan Chase chief and unofficial winner of the credit crisis, may need to watch his back.
lead_paragraph: What’s the best job in financial services? The available chief executive’s seat at the troubled Bank of America may not spring to mind.

headline.main: A Tough Job Now, But a Big Upside
headline.print_headline: A Tough Job Now, But a Big Upside

abstract: JPMorgan Chase agreed to buy the half of Cazenove it does not already own in a widely-expected deal that values the 190-year-old British stockbroker at $3.4 billion.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase agreed to buy the half of Cazenove it does not already own in a widely-expected deal that values the 190-year-old British stockbroker at $3.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:42 a.m. JPMorgan Chase agreed on Thursday to buy the rest of Cazenove, its British investment banking joint venture partner, for $1.7 billion to strengthen its franchise in a country whose banks are either struggling to return to profit or looking abroad for growth.

headline.main: JPMorgan to Take Over Cazenove for $1.7 Billion

abstract: The American bank paid $1.7 billion for the rest of Cazenove to strengthen its investment banking unit in Britain.
snippet: The American bank paid $1.7 billion for the rest of Cazenove to strengthen its investment banking unit in Britain.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  JPMorgan Chase agreed on Thursday to buy the rest of Cazenove, its partner in a British investment banking joint venture, for $1.7 billion to strengthen its franchise in a country whose banks have either struggled to return to profit or looked abroad for growth.

headline.main: JPMorgan Buys the Rest of a British Bank Partner
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Buys the Rest Of a British Bank Partner
